description: Deletes a dataset group created using the CreateDatasetGroup operation. You can only delete dataset groups that have a status of ACTIVE, CREATE_FAILED, or UPDATE_FAILED. To get the status, use the DescribeDatasetGroup operation. This operation deletes only the dataset group, not the datasets in the group.

parameters.name: DatasetGroupArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the dataset group to delete.
